mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.sex, a.identification_no AS identificationNo, a.agency_name AS agencyName, a.agency_id AS agencyId, d.name AS targetAgencyName, c.target_agency AS targetAgencyId FROM complaint_agency_change c LEFT JOIN org_personnel a ON c.personnel_id = a.id LEFT JOIN org_agency d ON c.target_agency = d.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 and a.id =#{id}
